mapper.select: select MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , GENDER , PHONE , EMAIL , BIRTH , ZIP_CODE , ADDRESS , DEP_NO , DEPARTMENT , JOB , RANK , EXTENSION_NO , ENROLL_DATE , RESIGN_DATE , ORIGIN_NAME , PATH , MEM_VAC_DATE , MEM_USED_DATE , MEM_TOTAL_DATE , MSG_RESTRICT , NOTICE_AUTH , status from member where status IN ('Y', 'A') and mem_id = #{memId}
select count(*) from member where status = 'Y'
select mem_no , mem_name , mem_id , department , rank from member where status = 'Y' order by mem_no desc

select count(*) from member where status = 'Y'
and mem_name
and mem_id
and department
like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

select mem_no , mem_name , mem_id , department , rank , to_char(resign_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as resign_date from member where status = 'Y'
and mem_name
and mem_id
and department
like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by mem_no desc

select mem_no , mem_id , mem_name , gender , phone , email , birth , zip_code , address , enroll_date , resign_date , department , job , rank , extension_no , origin_name , path from member where mem_no = #{memNo}
